item.title: Central-Continent
item.description: The central continent of The 2nd Realm is home to Snixia, Morelland, the Empire of the Petrified Child, and the Sarvaran Civilisation.

item.title: Empire of the Petrified Child
item.description: Culture Stonechild Imperial culture was heavily influenced by the mythology surrounding the Petrified Child (Stonechild Imperial: Äryýsh, from Proto-Morellic *Asteihar) Thus, religion was a big factor in the workings of society.

item.title: Sarvara
item.description: The Sarvaran Civilisation existed around 7,000YA, and spoke Sarvaran. Notable People Hastini the Elephant Hastini the Elephant Sarvaran: Hestį́da /xesˈtĩ́.da/ was a Sarvaran general who was known to wear a copper elephant mask over his mouth.

item.title: The -3rd Realm
item.description: Names Proto-Morellic: Lepni Ghuzi Adrani /ˈlɛp.ni ˈgʱu.z̠i ädˈrä.ni/ Sarvaran: Nö́pla Zhýra Edrą́da /ˈnǿ.pla ˈʒý.ɾa eˈdɾã́.da/ Stonechild Imperial: Nḯpla Zhý Eját /ˈnɪ́.

item.title: The 0th Realm
item.description: Names The name of this realm was derived from Basii + Adrani, Basii being from Arabic بَشَر, which came into Proto-Morellic (through contact with 0°e peoples) as Basiar, “human.

item.title: The 2nd Realm
item.description: Names Proto-Morellic: Simi Adrani /ˈs̠i.mi ädˈrä.ni/ Sarvaran: Swý̨ba Eją́da /ˈsʷỹ́.ba eˈd̠͡ʒã́.da/ Stonechild Imperial: Swýp Eját /ˈsʷýp eˈd̠͡ʒát/
